about_the_game:
This is the Prototype version of Kitsu's Destiny, available as a DLC, so you can look into the game before the engine change to RPG Maker MZ as it was originally on VX Ace.
It has some very interesting things, did you know the Dark Lady was a Lord? Did you know it was EVEN MORE LINEAR?
Honestly, this is the price of a cup of coffee, and you might finish it before you beat the DLC. It's just an extra support thing.
detailed_description:
This is the Prototype version of Kitsu's Destiny, available as a DLC, so you can look into the game before the engine change to RPG Maker MZ as it was originally on VX Ace.
It has some very interesting things, did you know the Dark Lady was a Lord? Did you know it was EVEN MORE LINEAR?
Honestly, this is the price of a cup of coffee, and you might finish it before you beat the DLC. It's just an extra support thing.

Kitsu's Destiny - Prototype is created in RPG Maker VX Ace.

name: Kitsu's Destiny - Prototype

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows® 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 64-bit x86-based Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better display resolution
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows® 11 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4340 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 / AMD Radeon R9 380 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This DLC is the Prototype version of Kitsu's Destiny, available as a DLC as a look into the game before the engine change to RPG Maker MZ as it was originally on VX Ace.
